title: Wiggins Posterizes His Way to Victory
description:
Andrew Wiggins posterizes Luka in game 3. Jalen & Jacoby discuss Wiggins' big game and how the Warriors were too much for Luka and the Mavericks to handle. The guys tell you why Luka is right when thinking the 3-0 deficit may be too much to overcome, but maybe shouldn’t be looking at next year just yet. Also, tonight is game 4 for the Celtics vs Heat. Injuries are mounting up, but the guys tell you the key players that need to step up in order for each team to get the victory. Also, Justin Thomas dabs when winning the PGA Championship? Is that a soft move or boss move? Find out all that and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
